title: Inflation rises as expected in November: PCE data
full_text: Inflation rises as expected in November: PCE data. Personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) index — the Federal Reserve's preferred inflation gauge — rose 2.8% year-over-year and 0.2% month-over-month in.... PCE data for November crossing the wire. Let's send it over to Yahoo Finance's Fed correspondent Jennifer Schonberger to break down the Fed's preferred inflation gauge. Jen? Hey there, Julia. Yep, … [+1160 chars]
